content: In this last half year, if we take this half year, we have grown our subscriber base in South Africa by 21%; Asia, we grew by 20%; Europe by 16%; and Africa-other, outside South Africa, 7%. And at the same time, that's obviously the increased sales compared to last year that's driven that increased ZAR271 million.Our free cash flow, it's down 41% with ZAR171 million for the half year, which we believe is very healthy free cash flow.
